actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1980 to increase the dollar value of merchandise eligible for informal entry.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to increase from $250 to $600 the value of imported goods eligible for informal entry. Requires a statement specifying the kinds, quantities, and value of each kind of imported article eligible for informal entry but included in a shipment valued in excess of $250.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1980 to increase the dollar value of merchandise eligible for informal entry.
